code: import React from"react";import'./Blog.css';import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import Axios from'axios';import ReactMarkdown from"react-markdown";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Blog(){const[data,setData]=React.useState('');const{post}=useParams();React.useEffect(()=>{fetchData(post);},[]);const fetchData=async post=>{try{const response=await Axios.get('http://localhost:3001/blogs/'+post,{responseType:Blob});console.log(response.data);setData(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error in loading posts: ',error);}};console.log(data);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactMarkdown,{children:data});}export default Blog;
